Variable.Name: m
Variable.Comment: The mass of the pendulum bob

Variable.Name: k2
Variable.Comment: Spring constant for the second spring

Variable.Name: x0
Variable.Comment: The initial x-coordinate of the first block

Variable.Name: x02
Variable.Comment: The initial x-coordinate of the second block

Variable.Name: x03
Variable.Comment: x position of the pendulum support

Variable.Name: y0
Variable.Comment: The y-coordinate of the first block

Variable.Name: y02
Variable.Comment: The y-coordinate of the second block

Variable.Name: y03
Variable.Comment: y position of the pendulum support

Variable.Name: angle
Variable.Comment: Initial angle of the pendulum, in degrees

Variable.Name: x2
Variable.Comment: x position for the second block

Variable.Name: x3
Variable.Comment: x coordinate of the pendulum bob

Variable.Name: y2
Variable.Comment: y position for the second block

Variable.Name: y3
Variable.Comment: y coordinate of the pendulum bob

Variable.Name: line1
Variable.Value: "利用滑塊去設置各種變數的值"

Variable.Name: line2
Variable.Value: "右邊的滑塊給第一個阻礙。 左邊的則給鐘擺和第二個阻礙"

Variable.Name: line3
Variable.Value: "動畫顯示每個障礙與鐘擺之位置、速度和加速度。"

Variable.Name: line4
Variable.Value: "你可以利用圖畫去顯示對於時間而產生的動能、位能和總能。"

Variable.Name: line6
Variable.Value: "它將強迫按鈕疊加到每個物件的自由體圖上。"

Variable.Name: line6b
Variable.Value: "藍色是法向力或張力。紅色是重力。紫色是彈力。"

Variable.Name: line6c
Variable.Value: "此減震之滑塊可以造成摩擦力；也就是這個在自由體圖上的黑色指標。"

Variable.Name: line7
Variable.Value: "當你在測量某個區間時，這個暫停和播放鍵可以幫助你。"

Variable.Name: line9
Variable.Value: "使用重置模擬按鍵去回到模擬的初始設定。"
